articles.title: Deep Learning Applications in Medical Image Analysis: A Comprehensive Review
articles.abstract: This review examines the latest advancements in deep learning techniques applied to medical image analysis across various modalities including MRI, CT, and X-ray. We discuss current challenges and future directions in the field.
articles.bibtex: @article{rouzrokh2023deep, title={Deep Learning Applications in Medical Image Analysis: A Comprehensive Review}, author={Rouzrokh, P. and Smith, J. and Johnson, A.}, journal={Journal of Medical Imaging}, volume={10}, number={2}, pages={123--145}, year={2023}, publisher={Medical Society Publishing}}

articles.title: Transformer-Based Models for Clinical Text Classification
articles.journal: Conference on Natural Language Processing in Healthcare
articles.abstract: We present a novel approach to clinical text classification using transformer-based models. Our method achieves state-of-the-art performance on multiple benchmark datasets while reducing computational requirements.
articles.bibtex: @inproceedings{rouzrokh2022transformer, title={Transformer-Based Models for Clinical Text Classification}, author={Rouzrokh, P. and Williams, R.}, booktitle={Conference on Natural Language Processing in Healthcare}, pages={210--220}, year={2022}}

articles.title: A Novel Framework for Automated Diagnosis of Pulmonary Diseases Using Deep Convolutional Networks
articles.abstract: This paper introduces a novel deep learning framework for automated diagnosis of pulmonary diseases from chest X-rays and CT scans. Our approach combines convolutional neural networks with attention mechanisms to focus on relevant anatomical regions.
articles.bibtex: @article{rouzrokh2021novel, title={A Novel Framework for Automated Diagnosis of Pulmonary Diseases Using Deep Convolutional Networks}, author={Rouzrokh, P. and Brown, T. and Garcia, M. and Cohen, S.}, journal={IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging}, volume={40}, number={3}, pages={334--349}, year={2021}, publisher={IEEE}}
